page.title: 04Bellfield School Meals.
page.content: Bellfield Primary School serves over 700 meals every school week for those who want them.The meals cost 58p each. About one in three of those who take school meals have free dinners. The cook in charge is Mrs.Young who was voted{cook of the year 1984.}She has 5 helpers in the kitchen.Each day the menu varies so that boys and girls can have a{balanced diet.}The cook also provides special diets for those who suffer diabetes. {A typical daily menu. Choped ham and pork with salad and chips. followed by Apple tart and custard. Some children prefer packed lunches or some go home for their lunch.
